faq.answer: We are a group of dedicated volunteers who are curating the news coming from state bulletins, press releases and news houses. We extract the details, like patient relationship to other patient (to identify local and community transmissions), travel history and status. We never collect or expose any personally identifiable data regarding the patients.
faq.question: Then who are you?

faq.answer: We collect the details from state press releases, official government links and reputable news channels as source. Data is validated by a group of volunteers and published into a Google sheet and an API, which is available for all
faq.question: How is the data gathered for this project?
